dt: {bc}a {d_link|bride|bride} or bride-to-be who is extremely demanding and difficult to deal with

dt.t: You've heard about {wi}Bridezillas{/wi}: women who get so wrapped up in their weddings that they tick off friends, insult family, and abuse florists, photographers, and caterers.
The tricky thing about {wi}Bridezillas{/wi} is that their transition from sweethearts to creatures from hell cannot be foreseen, not even by the future husbands.

et: blend of {et_link|bride|bride} and {it}Godzilla{/it}, dinosaur-like monster introduced in the Japanese film of the same name in 1954 (Anglicized adaptation of Japanese {it}Gojira{/it})
shortdef: a bride or bride-to-be who is extremely demanding and difficult to deal with
